Package com.atakmap.android.tilecapture.reader

Class MosaicTileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.tilecapture.reader.DatasetTileReader
      • com.atakmap.android.tilecapture.reader.MosaicTileReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BitmapReader, Disposable
    public class MosaicTileReader
extends DatasetTileReader
    Used for reading bitmap tiles from a MosaicDatabase2 Consists of multiple GdalTileReader per each dataset in the mosaic
